title: M&B: Napoleonic Wars (line battle) #2 - The fighting Fortieth!
description:
2 Line battles!  I play in the 40th (2nd Somersetshire) regiment of Foot 

If you want to play with me and join the 40th, visit this website and sign up!
http://40threg.enjin.com/

Once you have signed up wait for a reply from Locust through steam!
